display_long_description:
Among Us 3D: VR is a party game of teamwork and betrayal. Grab your crew of 4-10 players and launch into a fully 3D version of the beloved social deduction game. Work together as Crewmates to complete tasks before one or more Impostors kill everyone aboard.

Experience the core Among Us gameplay you know and love, such as tasks, sabotages, Emergency Meetings, and venting — now in 3D!

Play as either Crewmate or Impostor.

• Crewmate Mission: Complete all the tasks or eject the Impostor. Keep your eyes and ears open - someone could be lurking right around the corner.

• Impostor Mission: Sabotage and kill the Crewmates! Frame the crew, sneak through the vents, and craft the perfect lie.

▬▬ FEATURES ▬▬

• Permanent Game Mode: Tag Mode! As the Infected, try to catch and infect all the Crewmates to expand your ranks before the Crewmates can finish a set number of tasks.

• Regular Limited Time Events bring something new and exciting throughout the year!

• Complete new and returning crew favorite tasks, reimagined with innovative and immersive first-person controls.

• Customize your gameplay, comfort, and safety settings to build the best experience possible!

• Lobby up and connect with millions of other Crewmates — including Among Us 3D PC players! — with native crossplay. 

• Create custom lobbies for you and your closest pals with unique and personalized settings.

• Yap away with native, proximity voice chat or communicate with efficient Quick Text Chat options.

• Fashion your Crewmate with an endless number of color, hat, glove, and skin combinations! 

Note: Among Us 3D is not compatible and does not feature crossplay with the original Among Us game.
